desc: We sell high quality yarns for hand knitting and crochet, needles, hooks and accessories. We stock select brands - Filcolana, Lana Gatto, Lang Yarns, Sandnes yarns; Lykke needles and accessories.

layout.text:
KNiTT WILL BE CLOSED BETWEEN 13TH JULY UNTIL 5TH AUGUST. ALL ORDERS PLACED DURING THIS TIME WILL BE POSTED ON 8TH AUGUST.
WE WISH YOU ALL A GREAT SUMMER!
